document_data.name: Haemir Waelvor
document_data.mainbody: '''Haemir Waelvor''' was an inhabitant of [[Myth Drannor]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]], and a scion of house [[Waelvor]].
document_data.Abilities: Besides the spells he used to strike at Bhuraelea and Mladris, he meant to consume their lives to power his shield-sundering.
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|241}}, Haemir Waelvor was part of an attack on [[Mythanthor]]'s tower. He struck down the two sorceresses guarding the high mage, [[Bhuraelea]] and [[Mladris]], in a surprise attack; however, he was thwarted finally by [[Elminster]], who had been present as some sort of phantom. He was finally slain by Mythanthor himself.
